id.description: The id of the sub-system. Must be unique across the parent system.

description.description: The description of the sub-system, in markdown format.

position.description: The position of the sub-system in the parent system.

x.description: The X position of the sub-system in the parent system.

y.description: The Y position of the sub-system in the parent system.

hideSystems.description: Whether to show or hide the sub-systems of the system.
